item.title: On data classes in Python 3.8 and 3.9
item.description: In this post I gather a few comments and give some examples on the usage of data classes in Python. Data classes Data classes were introduced in Python 3.7. We could summarize them as a convenient way to represent data, since classes decorated with @dataclass will supply methods such as __init__() or __repr__() without having to define them.
